trans-unit.source: The VlvRequestControl class is used to request virtual list view (VLV) support from the server.
trans-unit.target: VlvRequestControl 類別用來向伺服器要求虛擬清單檢視 (VLV) 支援。

trans-unit.source: The VlvRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: VlvRequestControl 建構函式建立的執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The VlvRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and target entry.
trans-unit.target: VlvRequestControl 建構函式建立的執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref>類別使用目標項目與指定的項目計數。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the list results.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端會要求從伺服器傳回結果清單中的目標項目之前的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the results.
trans-unit.target: 若要在結果中傳回用戶端會要求從伺服器在目標項目之後的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The target entry for the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋目標項目。

trans-unit.source: The VlvRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and offset.
trans-unit.target: VlvRequestControl 建構函式建立的執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref>類別使用指定的項目計數和位移。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to send back in the list results.
trans-unit.target: 從伺服器用戶端要求，傳送回結果清單中的目標項目之前的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to send back in the results.
trans-unit.target: 從伺服器用戶端要求，傳送回在結果中的目標項目後的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The ratio between the offset value and the content count.
trans-unit.target: 位移的值與內容的計數之間的比率。

trans-unit.source: The VlvRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified entry counts and target entry.
trans-unit.target: VlvRequestControl 建構函式建立的執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.VlvRequestControl"></xref>類別使用目標項目與指定的項目計數。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries before the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the list results.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端會要求從伺服器傳回結果清單中的目標項目之前的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries after the target entry that the client requests from the server to return in the results.
trans-unit.target: 若要在結果中傳回用戶端會要求從伺服器在目標項目之後的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The target entry for the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋目標項目。

trans-unit.source: The AfterCount property specifies the number of entries after the target entry to return in the list results.
trans-unit.target: AfterCount 屬性會指定傳回結果清單中的目標項目後的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries after the target entry to return in the list results.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回結果清單中的目標項目後的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The BeforeCount property specifies the number of entries before the target entry to return in the list results.
trans-unit.target: BeforeCount 屬性指定的目標項目，以傳回結果清單中項目數。

trans-unit.source: The number of entries before the target entry to return in the list results.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回結果清單中的目標項目之前的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The ContextId property contains the context ID assigned by the server to identify this search operation.
trans-unit.target: 內文識別碼屬性包含由伺服器指派給識別這個搜尋作業的內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The context ID assigned by the server to identify this search operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要識別這個搜尋作業，伺服器指派給內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The EstimateCount property contains the content count of the list.
trans-unit.target: EstimateCount 屬性包含內容清單的計數。

trans-unit.source: The content count of the list.
trans-unit.target: 清單內容的計數。

trans-unit.source: The GetValue method returns a BER-encoded sequence that specifies the control.
trans-unit.target: GetValue 方法會傳回指定的控制項 BER 編碼的序列。

trans-unit.source: A BER-encoded sequence that specifies this control.
trans-unit.target: BER 編碼的序列，指定此控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Offset property contains the offset value of the target entry.
trans-unit.target: Offset 屬性包含在目標項目位移的值。

trans-unit.source: The offset value of the target entry.
trans-unit.target: 在目標項目位移的值。

trans-unit.source: The Target property contains the target entry of the search.
trans-unit.target: 目標屬性包含搜尋的目標項目。

trans-unit.source: The target entry of the search.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋目標項目。
